nodes.text: Amy Allen (born October 24, 1976) is an American actress best known for her role as Twi'lek Jedi Aayla Secura in Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith.
Amy Allen was part of visual effects production and technical support at Industrial Light & Magic on Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.[source?]

Aside from portraying Jedi Knight Aayla Secura, she also portrayed three extras in the Outlander Club in Attack of the Clones. Namely, within the Legends continuity, these were identified as the Nalle triplets: Mya, Yma, and Lela Mayn (all three names are anagrams of the actress's name). Additionally, she played a Twi'lek senatorial aide in the DVD version of The Phantom Menace, replacing the Human aides of Senator Orn Free Taa.
